mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Tools.SqlServerDataProvider
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Migrates a website’s data store from XML files to an SQL Server database.
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Migrates a website’s data store from XML files to an SQL Server database. Because of data logic captured in .NET LINQ, the migration is seamless and requires no code changes.
